name: Monacle
description: %1's monacle allows him to see all invisible units on the map.

name: Catasrophic
description: %1's catasrophic Hellblast can wipe out entire army lines and is unique to her.

name: Bard
description: Being a bard, %1 is loved by all people and creatures around him. His songs inspire bravery which cause his creatures to regain 2 loyalty each round.

name: Luck
description: %1 posesses unmatched skill and seemingly endless luck in the Rune Game. For this reason he always seems to draw the runes he needs.

name: Telepath
description: %1 is a telepath. This allows him to chose, pung, kong, game and cast spells even when silence has been cast.
